title: Tranquil Mexico Countryside Escape w. Daily Breakfast & Cocktail
description:
Experience the magic of Mexico at this enchanting escape surrounded by sweeping mountains, towering cacti and colorful wildflowers. This stunning retreat is nestled in San Miguel de Allendeâ€™s countryside, conveniently close to the lively downtown. Blending traditional Mexican architecture with modern design, it boasts spacious rooms and private terraces offering views of the surrounding Sierra Madre Mountains.

Explore the city's colourful streets filled with art galleries, boutiques and local markets, or take a quick drive to the stunning neo-Gothic church, Parroquia de San Miguel Arcangel. For food-lovers, the city offers a rich culinary scene, with a variety of restaurants serving traditional Mexican cuisine. Back at the hotel, enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the spa, or savour delicious local dishes at Comunidad Restaurant.
